# Task: Create Task List Component

> **Task Number**: 02 | **Dependencies**: 01_setup.md | **Autonomy Level**: high

## Objective
Implement the core task list component that displays todo items and handles basic interactions.

## Rules Compliance
Follow coding standards, write unit tests for all functionality, and ensure accessibility compliance.

## Context
This is the central component of the todo app. It must render the list of tasks, handle user interactions, and maintain proper state management. The component should be reusable and well-tested.

## Requirements
- Create task list UI component
- Implement task rendering logic
- Handle task interactions (click to complete)
- Write comprehensive unit tests
- Ensure accessibility (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)

## Implementation Steps

### 1. Create Component Structure
Set up the base component with props interface and initial state management.

### 2. Implement Rendering Logic
Build the task list rendering with proper data binding and event handlers.

### 3. Add Interactivity
Implement click handlers for completing tasks and ensure proper state updates.

## Definition of Done
- [ ] Task list component created with proper structure
- [ ] Task rendering implemented with data binding
- [ ] Unit tests written with >80% coverage

## Testing
- Component renders correctly with empty list
- Component renders with multiple tasks
- Task completion toggles work correctly
- All edge cases covered in tests

## Completion Checklist
- [ ] All requirements met
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Code follows style guide

## Notes
This component is the core of the application. Focus on clean code, good separation of concerns, and comprehensive testing.
